did.unittitle: Paul Gordon Collection of Academy of Management Miscellany
did.abstract: Correspondence regarding the nomination of Paul Gordon for an Outstanding Service Award.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of correspondence regarding the nomination of Paul Gordon for an Outstanding Service Award.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Paul Gordon Collection of Academy of Management Miscellany #5904m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Paul J. Gordon, BBA, City University of New York, MBA, Cornell University, PhD, Syracuse University was the 24th President of Academy of Management (1969).

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Academy of Management is a professional association for scholars of management and organizations that was established in 1936. It publishes several academic journals, organizes conferences, and provides others forums for management professors and managers to communicate research and ideas.
From 1994 to 2016, the Academy was headquartered on the Briarcliff Manor, New York campus of Pace University. Since then it has been based off-campus in independent space in Briarcliff Manor.
